ComicInfo.Summary: Harvey Award-Winning Best Writer Ed Brubaker and Scream Award-Winning Best Artist Sean Phillips bring their first arc of CRIMINAL to a shattering conclusion. Leo has been backed into a corner, and though his experience and his survival instincts tell him to try to find a peaceful way out, something has been awakened inside the man most consider a coward. Something that he’s kept buried almost twenty years...His rage. But will it destroy him along with the men he aims it at? Critics have hailed Criminal as the best new series of the year, and many stores have been reporting first day sellouts around the country. Don’t miss your chance to catch the harrowing conclusion of “Coward” and enter the world of Criminal.
ComicInfo.Tags: Angie,Delron Krumsky,Roy-L.T.,Jeff Driscoll,Leo Patterson,Gnarly,Frank Kafka,Gretta Watson
ComicInfo.Title: Coward, Pt. 5
